lexUnit.name: vial.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a small container used especially for holding liquid medicines.

sentence.text: The pancreatic secretion was collected from the pancreatic fistula in small preweighed vials in 30 minute aliquots to measure the volume flow and protein outputs as described previously .
